= Introduction =

Welcome to WebVo, the online television show recorder and manager!  Thank you for using our product.  You have chosen a system that will allow you view a TV listing schedule, click on a show and have it record, as well as manage the shows you have recorded.

This document provides basic information about the system, as well as how to install and use it.  In case of difficulty, you can contact the following people, who will try to answer your questions as best as possible.


= Installation Instructions = 

Development and testing for the WebVo server was done on Ubuntu Linux 6.06 however other distributions of Linux should work as well.

You will need a TV Tuner card supported by IVTV driver. This driver supports the Hauppauge PVR 150/250/350/500 models. The PVR-250 is the only card known to work but any card supported by this driver should be fine.
The IVTV drivers can be found at [http://ivtvdriver.org/index.php/Main_Page]

*Software Dependencies*
MySQL 5.0
Apache 2.0
ruby 1.8
libxml-ruby 0.3.8.4
ruby-mysql 2.7

Checkout the WebVo source code from Google web hosting to the Apache web folder (ie. /var/www/htdocs). Instructions to check out the code from Google are available at http://code.google.com/p/webvo/source. 

Create the database by running the WebVo.sql file.
